text: Let me know how can I helpâ€¦

Hello everyone, Actually I'm testing the new custom quote system and I got a weird problem my client want a automatic taxe system. for the most case the system work perfectly but sometimes when I have specific subtotal amount I have a 1 cent error in my total number when I use this filter `|format_currency(LOCALE, CURRENCY, true)` I don't know if someone can help me with this. Thank you very much.

 For more precision there is my code :

  `{% if module.display_totals %}`
          `{% set totalTaxe = SUB_TOTALS.one_time.subtotal|multiply(1.14975)%}`
  `<tbody class="total-qoute-calculations">`
    `<tr>`
      `<td class="backgroundBlanc"></td>`
      `<td class="backgroundBlanc"></td>`
      `<td class="backgroundBlanc sousotalTotal">{{ module.Total_title }}</td>`
      `<td class="backgroundGris">{{totalTaxe|format_currency(LOCALE, CURRENCY, true)}}</td>`
    `</tr>`
  `</tbody>`
  `{% endif %}`

But in this case everything work fine I never have this 1 cent error

      `<tbody class="sous-total">`
        `{% set tps = 5.000 %}`
        
      `{% if SUB_TOTALS.one_time %}`
        `<tr>`
          `<td class="backgroundBlanc"></td>`
          `<td class="backgroundBlanc"></td>`
          `<td class="backgroundBlanc sousotalTotal">TPS ({{ module.ntps }})</td>`
          `<td class="backgroundGris">{{ SUB_TOTALS.one_time.subtotal|multiply(tps|divide(100))|format_currency(LOCALE, CURRENCY, true)}}</td>`
        `</tr>`
      `{% endif %}`
  
    `</tbody>`
  
        `<tbody class="sous-total">`
        `{% set tvq = 9.975 %}`
        
      `{% if SUB_TOTALS.one_time %}`
        `<tr>`
          `<td class="backgroundBlanc"></td>`
          `<td class="backgroundBlanc"></td>`
          `<td class="backgroundBlanc sousotalTotal">TVQ ({{ module.ntvq }})</td>`
          `<td class="backgroundGris">{{ SUB_TOTALS.one_time.subtotal|multiply(tvq|divide(100))|format_currency(LOCALE, CURRENCY, true) }}</td>`
        `</tr>`
      `{% endif %}`
  
    `</tbody>`
Btw you can do multi-line code with `````
